question: Which Indian cricket player placed in top 10 of ICC Players Rankings for ODIs?
explanation: Virat Kohli is the only Indian ranked in the top 10 of the International Cricket Council's (ICC) Players Rankings for ODIs as he managed to hold on to his third spot in the batsman's chart. The top three batsmen : South Africa's AB de Villiers (874 rating points), Australian David Warner (871) and Kohli (852) are separated by just 22 points. ICC Players Ranking for ODI batsmen are Rohit Sharma (12th), Mahendra Singh Dhoni (13th) and Shikhar Dhawan, who dropped a place to 15th.
